8    | #include <stdio.h>
9    | #include <stdlib.h>
10   | #include <string.h>
11   | #include <ctype.h>
12   | #include <conio.h>
13   | #include "video/v_video.h"
14   | #include "keys.h"
15   | #include "window.h"
16   | #include "fortify.h"
17   | 
18   | 
19   | extern SCREEN _cursvar;
20   | 
21   | /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------
22   |                         PROTOTYPES
23   | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
24   | static void show_bar(void);
25   | static void calc_pulldownbar(MENU_HEAD *head);
26   | static void mem_pulldownbar(void);
27   | 
28   | /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------
29   |                         LOCAL VARIABLES
30   | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
31   | static int  *columns;                  /* Ptr to array of start columns     */
32   | static char *hotkeys;                  /* Ptr to array of hotkeys           */
33   | static MENU_HEAD *cptr = NULL;         /* Copy of ptr to first menu header  */
34   | static MENU_HEAD *head = NULL;         /* Copy of ptr to actual menu header */
35   | static int  no_heads = 0;              /* Number of menu headers            */
36   | static int  menu;                      /* Selected menu                     */
37   | static MENU *mptr;                     /* Pointer to menu tree              */
38   | static WINDOW *pd_bar = NULL;          /* Window with pulldown bar          */
39   | 
40   | /*==============================================================================
41   |                         START OF FUNCTIONS
42   | ==============================================================================*/
43   | 
44   | /*#+func-------------------------------------------------------------------
45   |     FUNCTION: show_bar()
46   |      PURPOSE: Show the bar of the pulldown menu
47   |  DESCRIPTION: -
48   |      RETURNS: nothing
49   |      HISTORY: 910829 V0.1 - Initial version
50   | --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
51   | static void show_bar()
52   | {
53   |   int i;
54   |   int col;
55   | 
56   |   wn_log_indent(2);
57   |   wn_log("SHOW_BAR *****()\n");
58   | 
59   |   /*----------------------------------------------------------
60   |     Check if pulldownbar already openened. If not, do it here
61   |   ------------------------------------------------------------*/
62   |   if (!pd_bar)
63   |   {
64   |     pd_bar = wn_open(_NO_BORDER,0,0,_cursvar.cols,1,_menu_att,_menu_att);
65   |     col = 1;
66   |     for (i=0 ; i<no_heads ; i++)
67   |     {
68   |       /*--- show header ---*/
69   |       hotstring(0,col,head[i].hotkey,head[i].header,_menu_att);
70   |       col += strlen(head[i].header) + 2;
71   |     }
72   |     wn_save(pd_bar);
73   |   }
74   |   else
75   |     wn_restore(pd_bar);
76   | 
77   |   wn_log("END SHOW_BAR *****\n");
78   |   wn_log_indent(-2);
79   | }
80   | 
81   | /*#+func----------------------------------------------------------------
82   |    FUNCTION: pulldown()
83   |     PURPOSE: Show pulldown menu bar and react on key strokes
84   |       INPUT: MENU_HEAD *shead  : pointer to header information array
85   |              int       ikey    : Default key to react on
86   |              char      *help   : Pointer to help subject
87   |  DESRIPTION: -
88   |     RETURNS: 0 or valid key scan-code
89   |     VERSION: 901115 V0.5
90   |              910829 V0.6 - Using popup() now for generality
91   | --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
92   | int pulldown(MENU_HEAD *shead, int ikey, char *menu_help)
93   | {
94   |   unsigned int  key;
95   |   char c;
96   |   int match = FALSE;
97   |   unsigned int choise = 0;
98   |   int i;
99   | 
100  |   wn_log_indent(2);
101  |   wn_log("pulldown() MENU_HEAD=%p\n",shead);
102  | 
103  |   /* SHOW MENU HEADERS
104  |   --------------------*/
105  |   pulldown_bar(shead);
106  | 
107  |   /*----------------------------------------
108  |      Use initial key or wait for a keypress
109  |   -----------------------------------------*/
110  |   wn_log("pulldown() - Waiting for first key press\n");
111  |   if (ikey)
112  |     key = ikey;
113  |   else
114  |     key = waitkey();
115  |   wn_log("key pressed = %x\n",key);
116  | 
117  |   /*--- If function key, react on it  */
118  |   if (is_fkey(key)) {
119  |     wn_log("function key pressed\n");
120  |     switch(key) {
121  |       case F1:  help(menu_help); return(0); break;
122  |       default:  do_funkey(key); break;
123  |     }
124  |   }
125  | 
126  |   /*--- If ESC key, return  */
127  |   if (key == ESC_KEY)
128  |     return(ESC_KEY);
129  | 
130  |   c = (char) (key & 0x00FF);
131  |   wn_log("character = <%c>\n",c);
132  | 
133  |   /*----------------------------------------------
134  |     Check if key matches with one of the hotkeys
135  |   -----------------------------------------------*/
136  |   for (i=0 ; i<strlen(hotkeys) ; i++) {
137  |     if (c == hotkeys[i] || toupper(c) == hotkeys[i]) {
138  | 	  wn_log("we have a hotkey match\n");
139  | 	  match = TRUE;
140  | 	  break;
141  | 	}
142  |   }
143  |   if (match == TRUE) {
144  |     menu = i;
145  |   }
146  |   else {
147  |     wn_log("no match found\n");
148  |     return(key);
149  |   }
150  | 
151  | 
152  |   /* THERE IS A MATCH ...
153  |   ----------------------*/
154  |   v_cursoroff();
155  |   while(TRUE)
156  |   {
157  |     mptr = head[menu].mptr;
158  | 	wn_log("mptr = %p\n",mptr);
159  |     if (head[menu].number != 0)
160  |       choise = popup(head[menu].number,mptr,1,columns[menu]);
161  |     else
162  |     {
163  | 	  wn_log("pulldown() - check if a function is defined\n");
164  |       /*---------------------------------------------
165  |         If a function was defined, perform function
166  |       -----------------------------------------------*/
167  |       if (mptr[0].function != NULL) {
168  | 	    wn_log("perform function \n");
169  |         (*(PFI)(mptr[0].function))();
170  | 	  }
171  |     }
172  | 
173  |     wn_log("choise = %x\n",choise);
174  |     switch(choise)
175  |     {
176  |       case ARROW_LEFT:
177  |         v_setattrib_area(0, columns[menu], strlen(head[menu].header), 1, _menu_att);
178  |         menu = (--menu + no_heads) % no_heads;
179  |         show_bar();
180  |         break;
181  | 
182  |       case ARROW_RIGHT:
183  |         v_setattrib_area(0, columns[menu], strlen(head[menu].header), 1, _menu_att);
184  |         menu = ++menu % no_heads;
185  |         show_bar();
186  |         break;
187  | 
188  |       default:
189  |         break;
190  |     } /* switch(choise) */
191  | 
192  |     if (choise == ESC_KEY)
193  |       break;
194  | 
195  |   } /* while(TRUE) */
196  |   show_bar();
197  |   return(0);
198  | }
199  | 
200  | /*#+func-----------------------------------------------------------------
201  |     FUNCTION: calc_pulldownbar()
202  |      PURPOSE: Perform calculations for the pulldown bar
203  |  DESCRIPTION: -
204  |      RETURNS: nothing
205  |      HISTORY: 910829 V0.1 - Calculations moved from pulldown_bar()
206  |                             to this function to be more readable.
207  | --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
208  | static void calc_pulldownbar(MENU_HEAD *head)
209  | {
210  |   int i,j;
211  |   int col;
212  |   MENU *m;         /* Pointer to menu        */
213  | 
214  | 
215  |   wn_log("calc_pulldownbar()\n");
216  | 
217  |   /*-------------------------------------------
218  |     Preprocess the entrys of each menu[header]
219  |   ---------------------------------------------*/
220  |   for (i=0 ; i<no_heads ; i++)
221  |   {
222  |     m = head[i].mptr;
223  |     j = 0;
224  |     while (m->header)
225  |     {
226  |       strcpy(m->string,m->header);   /* Copy header to string            */
227  |       j++;                           /* Increase counter                 */
228  |       m = m+1;                       /* Update menu pointer              */
229  |       head[i].number = j;            /* Update cntr of number of entries */
230  |     }
231  |   }
232  | 
233  |   col = 1;                      /* start column of first header */
234  |   for (i=0 ; i<no_heads ; i++)
235  |   {
236  |     /*--- Save header hotkey and header start column ---*/
237  |     columns[i] = col;
238  |     hotkeys[i] = toupper(head[i].header[head[i].hotkey]);
239  |     col += strlen(head[i].header) + 2;
240  |   }
241  | 
242  |   hotkeys[no_heads] = '\0';  /* Terminate the array of hotkeys   */
243  | }
244  | 
245  | /*#+func-------------------------------------------------------------------
246  |     FUNCTION: mem_pulldownbar()
247  |      PURPOSE: Perform memory manupilation for the pulldown bar
248  |  DESCRIPTION: -
249  |      RETURNS: nothing
250  |      HISTORY: 910829 V0.1 - Mem manupilations moved from pulldown_bar()
251  |                             to this function to be more readable.
252  | --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
253  | static void mem_pulldownbar()
254  | {
255  |   /*--------------------------------------------
256  |     ALLOCATE OR REALLOCATE MEMORY FOR 'COLUMNS'
257  |   ----------------------------------------------*/
258  |   if (columns == NULL)
259  |   { if ((columns = (int *) malloc(no_heads*sizeof(int))) == NULL)
260  |     { printf("Out of memory\n");
261  |       exit(1);
262  |     }
263  |   }
264  |   else
265  |   {
266  |     if ((columns = (int *) realloc((char *)columns,no_heads*sizeof(int))) == NULL)
267  |     {
268  |       printf("Out of memory\n");
269  |       exit(1);
270  |     }
271  |   }
272  | 
273  |   /*---------------------------------------------
274  |     ALLOCATE OR REALLOCATE MEMORY FOR 'HOTKEYS'
275  |   ----------------------------------------------*/
276  |   if (hotkeys == NULL)
277  |   {
278  |     if ((hotkeys = malloc((no_heads+1)*sizeof(char))) == NULL)
279  |     {
280  |       printf("Out of memory\n");
281  |       exit(1);
282  |     }
283  |   }
284  |   else
285  |   {
286  |     if ((hotkeys = realloc(hotkeys,(no_heads+1)*sizeof(char))) == NULL)
287  |     {
288  |       printf("Out of memory\n");
289  |       exit(1);
290  |     }
291  |   }
292  | }
293  | 
294  | /*#+func-------------------------------------------------------------------
295  |     FUNCTION: pulldown_bar()
296  |      PURPOSE: perform initial calculations for activiting 'pulldown'
297  |  DESCRIPTION: -
298  |      RETURNS: nothing
299  |      HISTORY: 920223 V0.2
300  | --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
301  | void pulldown_bar(MENU_HEAD *shead)  /* Pointer to array of headers */
302  | {
303  |   MENU_HEAD *h;
304  | 
305  |   wn_log("pulldown_bar() MENU_HEAD=%p\n",shead);
306  | 
307  |   /*--------------------------------------
308  |     If same menuline as last time, return
309  |   ----------------------------------------*/
310  |   if (cptr == shead)
311  |     return;
312  |   else
313  |   {
314  |     cptr = shead;
315  |     head = shead;
316  |   }
317  | 
318  |   /*-------------------------------
319  |     Determine number of menu heads
320  |     this must be done before calling
321  |     mem_pulldownbar()
322  |   ---------------------------------*/
323  |   h = shead;
324  |   while (h->header)
325  |   {
326  |     no_heads++;
327  |     h++;
328  |   }
329  | 
330  |   /*------------------------------
331  |     Assign memory and
332  |     Perform initial calculations
333  |     Show the menu bar
334  |   -------------------------------*/
335  |   mem_pulldownbar();
336  |   calc_pulldownbar(head);
337  |   show_bar();
338  | 
339  | }
340  | 
341  | /*#+func-----------------------------------------------------------------------
342  |     FUNCTION: exit_pulldown()
343  |      PURPOSE: exit from pulldown menu
344  |  DESCRIPTION: free's allocated memory
345  |      RETURNS: nothing
346  |      HISTORY: 920107 V0.1 - Initial version
347  | --#-func----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
348  | void exit_pulldown()
349  | {
350  |   wn_log("exit_pulldown()\n");
351  |   
352  |   if (hotkeys)
353  |     free(hotkeys);
354  |   if (columns)
355  |     free((char *)columns);
356  | }
